description: Prototyper is a generative UI platform for designers, frontend engineers and PMs.
title: Prototyper | The fastest way to design UI
introduction: Prototyper is the fastest way to build, test, and ship products used by 500+ designers, frontend engineers, and product managers. It allows users to generate UI with React from simple text prompts and images, enabling them to prototype their next idea in minutes.
features: Generate UI with React from simple text prompts and images
Design and iterate using Natural Language
Side-by-side editor for real-time code adjustments
targetPeople: Designers, frontend engineers, and product managers

faqs.question: Do you offer a free trial?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a free trial. You can try Prototyper by editing the examples, without a credit card.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
faqs.answer: You can cancel your subscription at any time. You can do this from your account settings.

faqs.question: Where can I find my invoices?
faqs.answer: You can find your invoices in your account settings.

faqs.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faqs.answer: We accept all major credit cards and PayPal.

faqs.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. You can do this from your account settings.
